name: AI Legs
description:
After waking from a coma, you and your AI powered bionic legs must go on a brief but epic mission to stop some robots...

  • LMB to Shoot.
  • RMB to switch between hands and gun.

(you move faster w/ hands)

NOTE: lighting is a little screwed in some places in webgl. sorry bout that

programming by poorlydrawn, made for WOWIE4

textures, models, and sound from various free online sources (with the exception of the robots!)
